text: Kathryn "Kate" Mary Draper-Garraway (born 4 May 1967) is an English broadcaster and journalist. In the 1990s, Draper-Garraway was a journalist for ITV News Central and later a co-presenter of ITV News Meridian. From 2000 to 2010, she has co-presented GMTV. Currently, Draper-Garraway is the presenter of Mid Mornings with Kate Garraway on Smooth Radio and was a standby newsreader and a Friday co-anchor of the ITV Breakfast programme Good Morning Britain from 2014 to 2022. She was also a Buckingham Palace Senior News Correspondent from Good Morning Britain due to the death of Queen Elizabeth II from 9 September 2022 until 10 September 2022. Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:English journalists Category:English television presenters
title: Kate Garraway
